content: set consists of men s scarf and hat with cables rib and texture in karisma ** go to the weston scarf pattern here 1 ** drops design pattern no u-808 yarn group b size s/m l/xl head circumference 57/59 to 59/62 cm / 22½ /23¼ to 23¼ -24½ materials drops karisma from garnstudio 100-150 g color no 21 medium gray or use drops merino extra fine from garnstudio 100-150 g colour no 04 medium grey drops double pointed needles and circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 4 mm/us 6 - or size needed to get 21 sts x 28 row in stockinette st = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm drops circular needle 40 cm / 16 size 3 5 mm/us 4 for rib 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/174-10-weston-scarf
